    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_28961ba0e5a0d9d4d7b5eb156d020d2d52d160bd</entry>
          </identifier>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_28961ba0e5a0d9d4d7b5eb156d020d2d52d160bd</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Molecular energies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Molekulare Energie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergies moléculaires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energias molecular</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energie molecolari</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μοριακές ενέργειες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energías moleculares</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that a monatomic molecule has a translational kinetic energy (a) and a diatomic molecule can obtain both translational and rotational kinetic energies (b).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">monatomic molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rotational kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">translational kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß ein monatomic 
Molekül eine translational kinetische Energie (a) hat und ein 
diatomic Molekül translational und kinetische Rotationsenergie (b) 
erhalten kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre qu'une molécule 
monatomic a une énergie cinétique de translation (a) et une 
molécule diatomique peut obtenir les énergies cinétiques de 
translation et de rotation (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que uma molécula 
monatomic tem uma energia cinética translational (a) e uma molécula 
diatomic pode obter  as energias cinéticas translational e 
rotatórias (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che una molecola 
monatomic ha un'energia cinetica translational (a) e una molecola 
diatomic può ottenere sia le energie cinetiche translational che di 
rotazione (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι ένα monatomic 
μόριο έχει μια μεταφραστική κινητική ενέργεια (α) και ένα 
diatomic μόριο μπορεί να λάβει και τις μεταφραστικές και 
περιστροφικές κινητικές ενέργειες (β).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que una molécula 
monatomic tiene una energía cinética de translación (a) y una 
molécula diatómica puede obtener las energías cinéticas de 
translación y rotatorias (b).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Temperatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">monatomic Moleküle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kinetische Rotationsenergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">translational kinetische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la température</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">molécules monatomic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie cinétique de rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie cinétique de translation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia cinetica di rotazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia cinetica translational</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θερμοκρασία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">monatomic μόρια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιστροφική κινητική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μεταφραστική κινητική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">temperatura</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
